job_details.Functieomschrijving:
The AI Team is part of a larger Methodology & Analytics Team that helps create new innovative solutions for our analysts worldwide. We are looking for someone to join our AI Team and help us develop innovative cloud applications for market research clients. If you identify yourself as an AI Engineer, Machine Learning Engineer or Data Scientist and you like the idea of building cloud applications that leverage AI, then this job might be for you!

   As an AI Engineer, you will play a crucial role in the growing and dynamic team. Specifically, you will:

   Research & Develop
     * Develop deep learning powered AI, especially LLM applications tailored for market research clients
     * Support the development of interactive dashboards
     * Work with LLM providers, such as OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, etc.
     * Work with various cloud services, particularly AWS (EC2, ECS, Lambda, etc.).
     * Collaborate closely with AI specialists, cloud experts and stakeholders to deliver robust, scalable solutions.

   Guide & Lead
     * Continuously learn more about business applications and propose innovative AI solutions to address business challenges. Taking the initiative is expected.
     * Stay up to date with the latest AI and LLM developments.
     * Help us develop internal trainings on AI/ML.
job_details.full_text:
AI Engineer

The AI Team is part of a larger Methodology & Analytics Team that helps create new innovative solutions for our analysts worldwide. We are looking for someone to join our AI Team and help us develop innovative cloud applications for market research clients. If you identify yourself as an AI Engineer, Machine Learning Engineer or Data Scientist and you like the idea of building cloud applications that leverage AI, then this job might be for you!

   As an AI Engineer, you will play a crucial role in the growing and dynamic team. Specifically, you will:

   Research & Develop
     * Develop deep learning powered AI, especially LLM applications tailored for market research clients
     * Support the development of interactive dashboards
     * Work with LLM providers, such as OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, etc.
     * Work with various cloud services, particularly AWS (EC2, ECS, Lambda, etc.).
     * Collaborate closely with AI specialists, cloud experts and stakeholders to deliver robust, scalable solutions.

   Guide & Lead
     * Continuously learn more about business applications and propose innovative AI solutions to address business challenges. Taking the initiative is expected.
     * Stay up to date with the latest AI and LLM developments.
     * Help us develop internal trainings on AI/ML.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes developing deep learning powered AI, specifically LLM applications tailored for market research clients. It mentions working with LLM providers like OpenAI, Anthropic, and Google, and developing interactive dashboards. The core responsibilities align with building and deploying generative AI solutions, which is the primary focus of a GenAI Engineer. While there's a mention of 'AI Engineer' and 'Machine Learning Engineer' as potential self-identifications, the specific tasks and technologies point more strongly towards generative AI applications rather than general predictive modeling.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Develop deep learning powered AI, especially LLM applications' directly relates to the creation and adaptation of machine learning models, specifically generative ones.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop deep learning powered AI, especially LLM applications

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'develop innovative cloud applications for market research clients' indicates building user-facing software systems that leverage AI.
job_tasks.phrase: develop innovative cloud applications for market research clients

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Support the development of interactive dashboards' implies building or contributing to user-facing applications for data visualization and interaction.
job_tasks.phrase: Support the development of interactive dashboards

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Continuously learn more about business applications and propose innovative AI solutions to address business challenges' highlights understanding business needs and aligning AI solutions with them.
job_tasks.phrase: Continuously learn more about business applications and propose innovative AI solutions to address business challenges

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Taking the initiative is expected' directly points to a proactive and entrepreneurial mindset.
The phrase 'Stay up to date with the latest AI and LLM developments' indicates a need for continuous learning and adaptation to new technologies.
job_tasks.phrase: Stay up to date with the latest AI and LLM developments

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate closely with AI specialists, cloud experts and stakeholders to deliver robust, scalable solutions' implies working effectively with diverse teams and communicating technical concepts.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate closely with AI specialists, cloud experts and stakeholders to deliver robust, scalable solutions

Stay up to date with the latest AI and LLM developments
Collaborate closely with AI specialists, cloud experts and stakeholders
